title: Interception
description: Ten years after we graduated from high school, I still want Chase Camden. Now a professional football player, he seems unattainable... until I run into him at our reunion.Ten years after we graduated from high school, Gavin Brooks still wants me. Now a superstar of rock music, he finds me unattainable... something I never knew until the night of our reunion.All I wanted was a second chance with the one who got away, but now Iâ€™m faced with an impossible choice: the rock star or the football player?Interception is the first book in the Love Triangle Duet.
author: Lisa Suzanne
